connections.description: Connections is an optional feature that an integration may provide. A common use of connections is to provide the ability to connect to a sandbox or production endpoint. Connection name values may be accessed in a flow e.g in the request_token section, the url is dynamic. Example: `'url_template': '{connection_name:$.url}/access/token/request'`

connection_names.description: A unique list of connection names that the integration supports

default_connection_name.description: The connection name that will be used when none is selected

OrderSources.description: A list of branded order sources associated with this integration

items.description: This represents a single branded order source within our system

Id.description: This is a unique GUID identifier for this order source

Name.description: The branded name for this order source Example: 'Shopify', 'eBay', 'Amazon Canada'

ApiCode.description: ApiCode for this order source, used by ShipEngine customers

SendEmail.description: Indicates whether or not our system is allowed to send emails to customers

HasCustomMappings.description: This field is deprecated, supply CustomFieldOptions instead.

CustomFieldOptions.description: This tells the UI which options are available for custom fields

items.description: A Custom Field Option describes a possible value that a store could send as a `sales_order_field_mapping` during `sales_orders_export` requests

Field.description: The name of the field being requested, which will be sent as`custom_field_*` when chosen by the seller. This value is expected to be unique per integration.

DisplayName.description: The name of this option to use in the UI

IsAdmin.description: Set to true if this option must be enabled by support

IsDeprecated.description: Set to true if this option shouldn't be shown in the UI. This does not prevent the option from being sent to the API for stores which have already chosen it.

CanLeaveFeedback.description: Indicates whether or not the order source allows sellers to leave feedback on customers

HasCustomStatuses.description: Indicates whether this order source allows for custom statuses on a seller by seller basis

CanConfigureTimeZone.description: Indicates whether or not the order source has inventory levels

HasInventoryLevels.description: Indicates whether or not the order source has inventory levels

Images.description: Images that will be used for this branded order source

Icon.description: The full path to the logo used in modals and other areas of our platform for this order source. Use join(__dirname, '../assets/logo.svg') @example "/dev/integration/assets/ordersource1/logo.svg"

Logo.description: The full path to the icon used for this order source. Use join(__dirname, '../assets/logo.svg') @example "/dev/integration/assets/ordersource1/icon.svg"

SupportedPackingSlipTemplateVersions.description: This lets the platform know which packing slip templates this order source supports
